ComicInfo.Series: Michael Turner Art Edition: The Aspen Extended Edition
ComicInfo.Summary:
The incredible artwork of Michael Turner in its purest form!
Experience the final Fathom story of legendary creator Michael Turner's brilliant career in this thrilling new format! Capturing Turner's original line work showcasing only his breathtaking pencils, this special "Artist Edition" over-sized issue is a must-have for any art fan! Featuring the final Fathom story illustrated by Turner as you've never seen it before!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Michael Turner | 1 | RI | 1:6 Retailer Incentive Sketch Variant Cover | Michael Turner | 2 |
